Package org.codehaus.groovy.vmplugin.v9

Class PluginDefaultGroovyMethods

java.lang.Object
org.codehaus.groovy.runtime.DefaultGroovyMethodsSupport
org.codehaus.groovy.vmplugin.v9.PluginDefaultGroovyMethods
public class PluginDefaultGroovyMethods extends DefaultGroovyMethodsSupport
Defines new Groovy methods which appear on normal JDK 9 classes inside the Groovy environment.
Since:
3.0.4
